name: 4TH WORLD CHEMISTRY CONFERENCE AND EXHIBITION
content: The first edition of World Chemistry Conference and Exhibition (WCCE) was born in Rome, Italy aiming to serve as a premier forum for the presentation of technological advances and research results in the fields of chemistry, engineering and applied sciences. The second edition WCCE was held in Valencia, Spain in July of 2018\. The third edition was held in Brussels (European Capital), Belgium in June of 2019, and the fourth edition World Chemistry Conference and Exhibition (WCCE-2021) is going to be held in world class city of London in October 04-06, 2021\. With the successful experience of the last three years in Rome (Italy), Valencia (Spain), and Brussels (Belgium), we truly believe that WCCE- 2021 will achieve greater success and provide a better platform for all the participants to have fruitful discussions and to share ideas of researches. With high standard and high quality submissions and presentations in WCCE-2021, it will one day become a leading conference in this specific academic area. It will feature invited keynote speeches, peer-reviewed paper presentations, and academic visit. This conference provides opportunities for the delegates to exchange new ideas and application experiences face to face, to establish business or research relations and to find global partners for future collaboration.
